data.text:
"Global warming doesn't exist!"

Greece is literally burning, wildfires have started because it's stupidly warm there, and they continue to flare up.

I guess someone is sneaking around with matches and petrol though, right? 🙄

#Greece #Wildfires #GlobalWarming

The frequency of large #wildfires in the US has risen by 30% since 2006. This, and building into ex-wildlands, has increased the risk of damage to property, meaning #insurers must stay on top of this complex peril. Our client in City AM: https://t.co/l1zFsxGMFs https://t.co/zAqrU76ybw

#Wildfires continued to burn across #Greece and #Turkey , forcing thousands of people to evacuate.

One of the best ways to make #wildfires and #climatechange worse is to suspend America's bedrock conservation laws for more industrial logging and roadbuilding on #publiclands. Fight back, raise your voice today: https://t.co/2gXzdd67Do https://t.co/7A2CySUdtL
after editing this guy filmed by @moutafis77, i had thoughts re the #112 number… a week ago i would have evacuated. now, i’m not so sure.  #greece #wildfires https://t.co/IvX9MM0jxa
